sentences.sContent: It's part of a broader nationalist movement that's gaining strength throughout the country.
sentences.sCn: 这是一场正在全国范围内日益壮大的更为广泛的民族主义运动的一部分。

sentences.sContent: ...The movement includes independent public charter schools...
...Even the strongest supporters of the reform movement concede that the task of raising achievement among disadvantaged students is hard work...
...They were able to accurately place the hair samples in broad regions roughly corresponding to the movement of raid systems...

words.tran: 动产的；可移动的；不固定的
原动力；鼓动者；搬运公司；搬家工人
移动，移动到；感动（move的过去式，过去分词）

trans.tranOther: a group of people who share the same ideas or beliefs and who work together to achieve a particular aim
